Uses of Interface
ussr.physics.PhysicsSimulation.Handler

Packages that use PhysicsSimulation.Handler
ussr.physics An abstract model of a physics engine, serves as the interface between physics-engine independent classes and the physics engine. 
ussr.physics.jme A physics simulation implementation based on JME (JMonkeyEngine).

 void PhysicsSimulation.addInputHandler(java.lang.String keyName, PhysicsSimulation.Handler handler)
          Define a user input handler for the running simulation, allowing the user to interact with the simulation in a dedicated way.
